author: Origo
title: Ground News - Péter Szijjártó: Donald Trump as a strong US president would give stability to the world from a security point of view
text:
Summary by Origo A strong US president always gives the world a sense of security stability, and with the return of Donald Trump , he could once again be a strong president of the United States, Foreign and Trade Minister Péter Szijjártó said on Friday in Palm Beach, Florida.
